header_text: You arrange to meet your new coworker at 8 p.m. at a local bar. You arrive on time and find that your new coworker is not there yet. Reflecting on your last conversation as you wait for a table, you remember that they found your life interesting.

elements.Text: Was your coworker interested in your life after your last conversation?

elements.name: You arrange to meet your new coworker at 8 p.m. at a local bar. You arrive on time and find that your new coworker is not there yet. Reflecting on your last conversation as you wait for a table, you remember that they found your life interesting._Romantic Relationships_comp_question
